verses.verse: And Yisra'EL <WH3478> abode <WH3427> <WH8799> in Shittim <WH7851>, and the people <WH5971> began <WH2490> <WH8686> to commit whoredom <WH2181> <WH8800> with the daughters <WH1323> of Moab <WH4124>.

And they called <WH7121> <WH8799> the people <WH5971> unto the sacrifices <WH2077> of their 'elohim <WH430>: and the people <WH5971> did eat <WH398> <WH8799>, and bowed down <WH7812> <WH8691> to their 'elohim <WH430>.
And Yisra'EL <WH3478> joined <WH6775> <WH8735> himself unto Baalpeor <WH1187>: and the anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> all the heads <WH7218> of the people <WH5971>, and hang them up <WH3363> <WH8685> before <WH5048> the YY <WH3068> against the sun <WH8121>, that the fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> may be turned away <WH7725> <WH8799> from Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the judges <WH8199> <WH8802> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Slay <WH2026> <WH8798> ye every <WH376> one <WH376> his men <WH582> that were joined <WH6775> <WH8737> unto Baalpeor <WH1187>.

And, behold, one <WH376> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> came <WH935> <WH8802> and brought <WH7126> <WH8686> unto his brethren <WH251> a Midianitish woman <WH4084> in the sight <WH5869> of Mosheh <WH4872>, and in the sight <WH5869> of all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, who were weeping <WH1058> <WH8802> before the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And when Pinchas <WH6372>, the son <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499>, the son <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> the Kohen <WH3548>, saw <WH7200> <WH8799> it, he rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> from among <WH8432> the congregation <WH5712>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> a javelin <WH7420> in his hand <WH3027>;

And he went <WH935> <WH8799> after <WH310> the man <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> into the tent <WH6898>, and thrust <WH1856> <WH8799> both <WH8147> of them through, the man <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and the woman <WH802> through <WH413> her belly <WH6897>. So the plague <WH4046> was stayed <WH6113> <WH8735> from the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And those that died <WH4191> <WH8801> in the plague <WH4046> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Pinchas <WH6372>, the son <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499>, the son <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> the Kohen <WH3548>, hath turned <WH7725> my wrath <WH2534> away <WH7725> <WH8689> from the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, while he was zealous <WH7065> <WH8763> for my sake <WH7068> among <WH8432> them, that I consumed <WH3615> <WH8765> not the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> in my jealousy <WH7068>.
Wherefore say <WH559> <WH8798>, Behold, I give <WH5414> <WH8802> unto him my covenant <WH1285> of peace <WH7965>:

And he shall have it, and his seed <WH2233> after <WH310> him, even the covenant <WH1285> of an everlasting <WH5769> Kohenhood <WH3550>; because <WH834> he was zealous <WH7065> <WH8765> for his 'Elohim <WH430>, and made an atonement <WH3722> <WH8762> for the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Now the name <WH8034> of the Yisra'ELite <WH376> that was slain <WH5221> <WH8716>, even that was slain <WH5221> <WH8717> with the Midianitish woman <WH4084>, was Zimri <WH2174>, the son <WH1121> of Salu <WH5543>, a prince <WH5387> of a chief <WH1> house <WH1004> among the SHim`onites <WH8099>.

And the name <WH8034> of the Midianitish <WH4084> woman <WH802> that was slain <WH5221> <WH8716> was Cozbi <WH3579>, the daughter <WH1323> of Zur <WH6698>; he was head <WH7218> over a people <WH523>, and of a chief <WH1> house <WH1004> in Midian <WH4080>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Vex <WH6887> <WH8800> the Midianites <WH4084>, and smite <WH5221> <WH8689> them:

For they vex <WH6887> <WH8802> you with their wiles <WH5231>, wherewith they have beguiled <WH5230> <WH8765> you in the matter <WH1697> of Peor <WH6465>, and in the matter <WH1697> of Cozbi <WH3579>, the daughter <WH1323> of a prince <WH5387> of Midian <WH4080>, their sister <WH269>, which was slain <WH5221> <WH8716> in the day <WH3117> of the plague <WH4046> for Peor's <WH6465> sake <WH1697>.
